name: NextStep
description:
NextStep (Nex) is a Company specializing in consulting and development of smart technology solutions for businesses wishing to apply into business operations. Moreover, NextStep offers marketing campaigns for client’s technology products. Our product development and design team is constantly innovative and cared for each product to provide exquisite experience and high-class quality to our customers.    
 
 
Since the time it was founded in the year 2015, the company has been involved in releasing numerous projects from enterprise to start-up products . Our proficiency in wide range of modern software technologies ensures that the solutions we develop perfectly will meet our client’s needs.
